item.title: [EU][Support] - Support unreachable by phone
item.description:
Jul 17, 16:27 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 17/07/2024 08:01 UTC
End time : 17/07/2024 14:23 UTC
Service impact : All FR & EU phone numbers from our operator were down (except for 1007 numbers)
Root cause : Network issue on provider side
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 17, 15:07 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : Our technical teams resolved the incident.
Since 14:23 UTC, support is reachable again by phone for all FR & EU phone numbers.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation

Jul 17, 09:32 UTC
Identified - We have identified the root cause of this problem with our supplier. We are currently working with them to find a solution to the problem.

Jul 17, 09:08 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jul 17, 08:30 UTC
Update - Workaround : Customers can come into support using Chat (for FR/EU customers) or dial 1007 (for FR customers)

Jul 17, 08:26 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 17/07/2024 08:01 UTC
Service impact : All FR & EU phone numbers from our operator are down (except for 1007 numbers)
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [EU][Customer Service] - API - Customer Panel - Order funnel incident notification
item.description:
Jul 17, 12:39 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 17/07/2024 12:16 UTC
End time : 17/07/2024 12:23 UTC
Service impact : High response time and high error rate causing errors on customers navigation or customer scripts on eu.api.ovh.com, API used by customer panel & order funel
Root cause : Due to a hardware issue, some hosts were malfunctioning
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

item.title: [Global][Live Chat]
item.description:
Jul 17, 10:01 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 11, 18:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 9, 09:00 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on the internal infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect your access to the Live Chat. A down time of 45 to 60 min is anticipated.

Start time : 11/07/2024 18:00 UTC
End time : 11/07/2024 20:00 UTC
Workaround : If you need assistance during the intervention hours, please create a ticket from your Help Center: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm?id=csm_get_help

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [India][Support] - Support unreachable by phone
item.description:
Jul 17, 07:23 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 17/07/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 17/07/2024 07:17 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a problem on our operator side.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jul 17, 06:24 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jul 17, 04:53 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 17/07/2024 04:00 UTC
Service impact : Support is temporarily unavailable by phone in India. This issue only affects Airtel.
Jio and Vodafone are working normally.
Workaround : Customers can come into support using Chat or dial 000 800 040 4567 from another telecom provider like Jio or Vodafone.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Support] - ServiceNow OneGate (Production)/ Help Centre portal maintenance
item.description:
Jun 22, 14:44 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 22, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 20, 16:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 22/06/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 22/06/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a punctual slowness or logoff of the application might be observed during the maintenance, Help Centre access could be degraded.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will update the application to improve security and stability.
Workaround : Help Center will remain accessible https://help.ovhcloud.com along with the Manager https://www.ovh.com/manager.
If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency. You can also access our documentation directly on our GitHub repository : https://github.com/ovh/docs/blob/develop/pages/index.md

Investigating - Start time : 07/06/2024 15:00 UTC

Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue with the metrics availability in the affected regions (VPS: BHS2/BHS6/UK2/DE2/SGP2, PCI: RBX-A). Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
